remarks: The ring of scalars of the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhsca.d $e |- D = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhsca $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> F = D ) $.
